Service Details: - Provides complex, specialized and flexible environments for people living with brain injury in a nurturing, innovative community environment- Programs support people to build meaningful relationships, to be connected to their community and to be involved in functional and productive activities- Coaches, challenges and motivates each person to reach their unique personal goals and build a fulfilling life for themselves
Eligibility: - 19 years and up- Medically stable- Have access to funding- Demonstrates interest and involvement
Address & Map: 11438 Bottom Wood Lake RdLake Country, BC     V4V 1V4
